title: I Think I Kinda, You Know – Just for a Moment Mashup (From ”High School Musical: The Musical: The Series”)
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Olivia Rodrigo & Joshua Bassett, 
Olivia Rodrigo
]
I fell in love
With a boy and I can't tell if I fell out
Now we can't play pretend
And I'm scared to talk to my best friend
[Pre-Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & 
Joshua Bassett
]
Should I stay or let you go?
Will you love me when the curtains close?
Is it just a part we're playin'?
'Cause it don't feel like we're fakin'
[Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & Joshua Bassett]
I think I kinda, you know
I think I kinda, you know
When we're underneath the lights
My heart's no longer broken
I think I kinda, you know
I think I kinda, you know
For a moment, just for a moment
A moment in love
[Post-Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo, 
Joshua Bassett
 & 
Both
]
I think I kinda, you know (
Just for a moment
)
I think I kinda, you know
I think I kinda, you know (
Just for a moment
)
I think I kinda, you know
I think I kinda, 
you know, you know, you know

[Verse 2: Joshua Bassett]
Sometimes you know exactly what to say
Then you open your mouth and the words go away
Don't want you to wonder or to doubt or guess
So let me tell you clearly what I'm tryna express
It's just three little words, yeah, it's not a big deal
It's not like I can help feelin' all that I feel
And by now, I'm sure you're thinkin' it's so obvious
But just in case it's not, what I'm sayin' is this
[Pre-Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & Joshua Bassett, 
Joshua Bassett
]
When we're singin' side-by-side
There's so much left unspoken
For a moment (
Ooh
), just for a moment
A moment in love
[Chorus: Both, 
Joshua Bassett
 & 
Olivia Rodrigo
]
(Just for a moment) I think I kinda, you know
(Just for a moment) I think I kinda, you know
(
But is a moment enough?
) Like the way that we flow
Like the way that we go
I think I kinda, you know
I think I kinda, you know
I think I kinda, you know
I think I kinda, you know

[Outro: Olivia Rodrigo & Joshua Bassett]
For a moment, just for a moment
